CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 23, reads: "Booth of Beauty - Among the many attractive booths which were visited at the Courier's Home Service Fair were Best Foods, Inc. whose giant picnic basket was filled with sandwich delights; A & P Food Stores, Phiip Morris Cigarettes, Carmen Murphy's House of Beauty Cosmetics, Trower Tailoring Company and Pepsi-Cola Metropolitan Bottling Company."
TitMainTitle: Man and woman standing in front of PET Milk, Best Foods, A & P Food Stores, Philip Morris, and House of Beauty Cosmetics booths, in Ammon Center for 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
